all_achievements.description: Kill 2 enemies with one bullet 25 times using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Sniper Suppressor" for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.

all_achievements.name: Public Enemy No. 1
all_achievements.description: Kill 250 enemies using only the Rattlesnake sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the Rattlesnake sniper rifle.

all_achievements.name: I Will Fade to Dark
all_achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure 4 bags of loot.

all_achievements.name: I Will Pass Through Walls
all_achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure at least 6 bags of loot and escape without killing anyone.

all_achievements.name: I Will Take With Impunity
all_achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure a piece of every available type of loot, including money, gold, cocaine, artifact, painting, weapons and server.

all_achievements.name: I Will Walk Faceless Among Men
all_achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure all 4 pieces of the samurai armor. Unlocks the "Somen Mempo" mask.

all_achievements.name: I Am Ninja
all_achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, secure 16 bags of random loot including all 4 pieces of the samurai armor.

all_achievements.name: I Will Die and Die, and Die Again
all_achievements.description: Complete the Shadow Raid job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: It Takes Two to Tango
all_achievements.description: In The Big Bank job, hack the correct computer on the first try. Unlocks "The First American" mask, the "Parchment" material, the "Roman" pattern and the "Tactical Grip" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: It Takes a Pig to Kill a Pig
all_achievements.description: Drop Floyd the pig on top of a law enforcer. Unlocks "The 1st" mask, the "Exhausted" material, the "Ruler" pattern and the "Extended Magazine" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: Sweet Sixteen
all_achievements.description: Complete The Big Bank job with 16 secured bags. Unlocks "The 16th" mask, the "Clay" material, the "Spartan" pattern and the "Marksman Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: 12 Angry Minutes
all_achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist in under 12 minutes on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Wooden Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: Don't Bring the Heat
all_achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm. Unlocks the "CQB Stock" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: Backing Bobblehead Bob
all_achievements.description: Bring Bobblehead Bob to the vault. Unlocks "The 18th" mask, the "Gemstone" material, the "God of War" pattern and the "Wooden Stock" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: Entrapment
all_achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, complete the heist with 12 bags in the default escape with all the lasers active. Unlocks the "CQB Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: You Owe Me One
all_achievements.description: In the Big Bank job, start the Big Bank job after having spent all 10 favors in Preplanning. Unlocks the "Retro Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: Don't Forget to Floss
all_achievements.description: Complete The Big Bank job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Funding Father
all_achievements.description: Complete any heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Big Bank" mask each. Unlocks the "Marksman Stock" for the Falcon rifle.

all_achievements.name: Police Brutality
all_achievements.description: Beat a Shield to death using the Telescopic Baton.

all_achievements.name: Lock, Stock & Eight Smoking Barrels
all_achievements.description: Own the Locomotive, Street Sweeper, Reinfeld, Mosconi, Izhma, Raven and M1014 Shotguns. Unlocks the "Flip-up Sight" for the Raven shotgun.

all_achievements.name: Swing Dancing
all_achievements.description: Complete any single day of a heist, killing at least 50 enemies using only your melee weapon.

all_achievements.name: Seven Eleven
all_achievements.description: Get 7 enemy headshot kills within 11 seconds using any shotgun. Unlocks the "Short Barrel" for the M1014 shotgun, "John" mask, "Explosive" material and "Terror" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Shotguns 101
all_achievements.description: Complete any heist by killing at least 50 enemies and getting 101% accuracy or above using any shotgun. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the M1014 shotgun.

all_achievements.name: Knock, Knock
all_achievements.description: Kill 50 Shields using any shotgun and slug ammo. Unlocks the "Collapsed Stock" for the M1014 shotgun.

all_achievements.name: Every day I'm Shovelin'
all_achievements.description: On the Nightclub job, kill 25 law enforcers using your shovel. Unlocks the "Short Barrel" for the Raven shotgun.

all_achievements.name: Clay Pigeon Shooting
all_achievements.description: Kill 10 snipers using any shotgun and flechette ammo. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the Raven shotgun, "Clint" mask, "Leaf" material and "Monkey Skull" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Shock and Awe
all_achievements.description: Hit 4 enemies simultaneously using any shotgun and HE rounds. Unlocks the "Solid Stock" for the M1014 shotgun.

all_achievements.name: Bang for the Buck
all_achievements.description: Kill 10 Bulldozers using any shotgun and 000 buckshot ammo. Unlocks the "Long Barrel" for the Street Sweeper shotgun, "Steven" mask, "Sparks" material and "Chief" pattern.

all_achievements.name: No Heist for Old Men
all_achievements.description: Complete any day of a heist in stealth with a Locomotive 12G shotgun modified with the "Silent Killer Suppressor" equipped. Unlocks the "Suppressed Barrel" for the Street Sweeper shotgun, "Rutger" mask, "Banana Peel" material and "Banana" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Four Monkeys
all_achievements.description: In the Rats job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Shotgun Pack" mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Precision Aiming
all_achievements.description: Kill 25 Bulldozers using the Gewehr 3 Rifle. Unlocks the "Sniper Barrel" for the Clarion rifle, "Sniper Stock", "Sniper Grip" and "Sniper Foregrip" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Precision Stock", "Precision Foregrip", "Precision Grip" and the "DMR Kit" for the Gewehr 3 rifle as well as the "Black Death" mask.

all_achievements.name: Big Bada Boom
all_achievements.description: Kill at least four enemies with one GL40 grenade launcher shot. Unlocks the "Sawed-off" Stock for the GL40 grenade launcher and the "Crow Goblin" mask.

all_achievements.name: Army of One
all_achievements.description: Equip the GL40 grenade launcher, the Locomotive 12G shotgun, and the Improved Combined Tactical Vest. Unlocks the "CQB Foregrip" and "Plastic Stock" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle.

all_achievements.name: So Many Choices
all_achievements.description: Own one of every Gage Assault Pack weapon in the game. Unlocks the "Short Barrel" for the Clarion rifle, "Light Stock" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Plastic Foregrip" and "Assault Kit" for the Gewehr 3 rifle, "Evil" material and "Vicious" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Artillery Barrage
all_achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies at 40 meters or more using only the GL40 grenade launcher. Unlocks the "Wooden Stock" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Pirate Barrel" for the GL40 grenade launcher, "Bone" material and "Muerte" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Unusual Suspects
all_achievements.description: In the Watchdogs job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different Assault Pack mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Light Foregrip" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle, "Tactical Foregrip" for the Gewehr 3 rifle, "Long Barrel" for the Clarion rifle, "Void" material and "Death" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Not Today
all_achievements.description: Kill a jumping Cloaker using the GL40 grenade launcher. Unlocks the "Wooden Stock", "Retro Grip" and "Wooden Foregrip" for the Gewehr 3 rifle.

all_achievements.name: Hammertime
all_achievements.description: Kill 25 thugs using the Ding Dong breaching tool melee weapon. Unlocks the "Frost" material and "Emperor" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Rabbit Hunting
all_achievements.description: Kill 10 Cloakers using the Gecko 7.62 rifle. Unlocks the "Skeletal Stock", "Fabulous Stock" and "Fabulous Foregrip" for the Gecko 7.62 rifle as well as the "Volt" mask.

all_achievements.name: Tour de Clarion
all_achievements.description: Kill 200 enemies using the Clarion rifle. Unlocks the "Suppressed Barrel" and "G2 Grip" for the Clarion rifle as well as the "Professor Wrath" mask.

all_achievements.name: Wrong Number
all_achievements.description: Complete the Hotline Miami job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Walk Faster
all_achievements.description: In day 2 of the Hotline Miami job, reach the Commissar's apartment in under 210 seconds on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Rasmus" mask, "Tactical Foregrip" and the "Ergonomic Stock" for the Uzi submachine gun, "Chromescape" material and "Palmtrees" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Do You Like Hurting Other People?
all_achievements.description: In the Hotline Miami job, kill 30 thugs with the Baseball Bat. Unlocks the "Dennis" mask, "Solid Stock" for the Uzi submachine gun, "Wooden Grip" for the Cobra submachine gun, "Rubber" material and "Hip to Be Polygon" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Overdose
all_achievements.description: Cook and secure six bags of meth on day 1 of the Hotline Miami job. Unlocks the "Graham" mask, "Ghetto Blaster", "Extended Mag" and "Just Bend It" for the Blaster 9mm submachine gun, "Error" material and "Be Somebody" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Sounds of Animals Fighting
all_achievements.description: In the Hotline Miami job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different Hotline Miami mask each on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Silent Death" and "Folded Stock" for the Uzi submachine gun, "Suppressor" and "No Stock" for the Cobra submachine gun and "Short Barrel" for the Blaster 9mm submachine gun.

all_achievements.name: Phew!
all_achievements.description: On day 2 of the Hotline Miami job, save someone in need. Unlocks the "Aubrey" mask, "Ergo Grip", "Extended Mag" and "Unfolded Stock" for the Cobra submachine gun, "Sunset" material and "Doodles" pattern.

all_achievements.name: State of the Art
all_achievements.description: Complete the Art Gallery job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Why Don't We Just Use a Spoon?
all_achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Breakout job on the Normal difficulty or above. Unlocks "Hoxton" as a playable character and the "Nova's Shank" melee weapon.

all_achievements.name: No Bars Can Hold Me
all_achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Breakout job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Cavity
all_achievements.description: Hurt an enemy using the Nova's Shank melee weapon.

all_achievements.name: Sixth Nightmare
all_achievements.description: Complete the Safe House Nightmare job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Death From Below
all_achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies as they rappel using the Nagant sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Constable" mask, the "Silenced Barrel" and the "Long Barrel" for the Nagant sniper rifle, "Gunsmoke" material and "Dazzle" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Special Operations Execution
all_achievements.description: Kill 25 enemies while in stealth using the Trench knife. Unlocks the "Red Bear" mask, "Short Barrel", "Suppressed Barrel", "Short Mag", "Folded Stock", "No Stock", "Solid Stock", "Heatsinked Suppressed Barrel" for the Patchett L2A1 submachine gun," Barrel Sight 44", "Damper.L 44 Nozzle" for the Broomstick pistol, "Red Sun" material and "Death Dealer" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Wind of Change
all_achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Historical" mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Discreet Stock" and "Short Barrel" for the Nagant sniper rifle, "Precision Barrel" for the Broomstick pistol, "Extended Mag" and "Long Barrel" for the Patchett L2A1 submachine gun and the "Heatsinked Suppressed Barrel" for the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun.

all_achievements.name: So Uncivilized
all_achievements.description: Equip a Broomstick pistol with the Damper.L 44 Nozzle and the Barrel Sight 44. Unlocks the "British Bulldog" mask, "High Capacity Mag" and "Holster Stock" for the Broomstick pistol, "Army Green" material and "Filthy Thirteen" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Bullet Hell
all_achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies within 10 seconds using the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun. Unlocks the "Old Blood and Guts" mask, "Light Barrel" for the Buzzsaw 42 light machine gun, "Patriot" material and "Captain War" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Vlad's Little Helpers
all_achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Normal difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Mrs. Claus" mask.

all_achievements.name: Stealing Christmas
all_achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Strinch" mask.

all_achievements.name: Cancelling Santa's Christmas
all_achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Very Hard difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Krampus" mask.

all_achievements.name: Claustrophobia
all_achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Mechanical Santa" mask.

all_achievements.name: Like Turkeys Voting for an Early Christmas
all_achievements.description: Complete the White Xmas job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Riders On the Snowstorm
all_achievements.description: In the White Xmas job, complete the heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above while each crew member wears a different "2014 Xmas" mask each. Unlocks the "Almir's Beard" mask.

all_achievements.name: Impossible, It Can't Be. Is It?
all_achievements.description: In the White Xmas job, secure the rare Almir's Toast.

all_achievements.name: Devil of a Job
all_achievements.description: Complete The Diamond job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Cat Burglar
all_achievements.description: In The Diamond job, complete the heist without triggering the alarm. Unlocks "The Cursed One" mask, "Sand" material and "Hieroglyphs" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Culture Vultures
all_achievements.description: In The Diamond job, secure 10 bags of additional loot. Unlocks the "Medusa" mask, "Rusting Metal" material and "Runes" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Smoke and Mirrors
all_achievements.description: In The Diamond job, steal the Diamond and escape in under 10 minutes. Unlocks the "Pazuzu" mask, "Diamond" material and "Horus" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Honor Among Thieves
all_achievements.description: In The Diamond job, complete the heist while you and your four man crew are wearing one different "Diamond Heist" mask each on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Diamonds in the Rough
all_achievements.description: In The Diamond job, complete the heist, diamond puzzle and steal the Diamond after the alarm has been triggered on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Anubis" mask, "Mummy Bandages" material and "Hawk Helm" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Tabula Rasa
all_achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above with each crew member using no skills, wearing suits, wielding Golden AK.762 rifles and Chicago Typewriter submachine guns. Unlocks a new skill slot.

all_achievements.name: Knockout!
all_achievements.description: Knock out a Bulldozer using the OVERKILL boxing gloves. Unlocks "The Champ" mask.

all_achievements.name: Derailed
all_achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Forest job on the Normal difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: A Pine in the Ass
all_achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Forest job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Beaver Team
all_achievements.description: In The Bomb: Forest job, cut down all trees within 5 seconds. Unlocks the "Butcher From Hell" mask, "Meat" material and "Pleter" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Pump It Up
all_achievements.description: In The Bomb: Forest job, do not let the cops disconnect the water hose while you are using the river water pump. Unlocks the "Tech Lion" mask, "Marble Rock" material and "Lion Game Lion" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Oppressor
all_achievements.description: Finish The Bomb: Forest job without letting any civilian flee or die, having at least five civilians in the heist, while escaping with the boat. Unlocks "The Doctor" mask, "Plywood" material and "Caduceus" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Maiden Voyage
all_achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Dockyard job on the Normal difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Fisherman's Fiend
all_achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Dockyard job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Sneaking With the Fishes
all_achievements.description: Complete The Bomb: Dockyard job in stealth on the Death Wish difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Lady Butcher" mask, "Rhino" material and "Checker Board" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Breaking Dead
all_achievements.description: In The Bomb: Dockyard job, find the meth lab. Unlocks the "Extended Mag" for the LEO pistol.

all_achievements.name: I've Got the Power
all_achievements.description: In The Bomb: Dockyard job, don't let the enemies cut the power. Unlocks the "Long Slide" for the LEO pistol.

all_achievements.name: Done in 60 Seconds
all_achievements.description: In The Bomb: Dockyard job, open the dock gate in 60 seconds using the keycards. Unlocks the "Custom Slide" for the LEO pistol.

all_achievements.name: OVE SAW 72000
all_achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, complete the heist on any difficulty with each crew member using the OVE 9000 saw as primary and secondary weapons. Unlocks the "THRUST Upper Receiver", "THRUST Lower Receiver" and "Long Ergo Foregrip" for the CAR weapon family.

all_achievements.name: Hey Mr. DJ
all_achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, have 12 hostages or more on the dance floor when you escape. Unlocks the "Aluminum Grip" for the AK weapon family, the "Aluminum Foregrip" for the Krinkov submachine gun and the "LW Upper Receiver" for the CAR weapon family.

all_achievements.name: $1.8M Speedrun
all_achievements.description: In the Mallcrasher job, loot $1,800,000 in loose cash within 50 seconds of starting the heist. The heist must be played on the OVERKILL difficulty. Unlocks the "Scope Mount" and "PBS Suppressor" for the AK weapon family, "Alfred" mask, "Dawn" material and "Dinosaur Skull" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Here Comes the Pain Train
all_achievements.description: In the Firestarter job, complete the heist on the OVERKILL difficulty or above, with all days done in loud and with a crew of 4 players using unmodified "AK Rifle" rifles and "PARA" submachine guns. Unlocks the "DMR Kit AK.762" and the "Low Drag Magazine" for the AK weapon family, "Timothy" mask, "Prehistoric" material and "Dinosaur Stripes" pattern.

all_achievements.name: The Wolf Lures You to Your Grave
all_achievements.description: In the Art Gallery job, kill two of the patrolling guards in stealth in the bathroom. Unlocks the "E.M.O. Foregrip" and the "OVAL Foregrip" for the CAR weapon family and the "Aftermarket Shorty" for the PARA submachine gun.

all_achievements.name: The Turtle Always Wins
all_achievements.description: In the Art Gallery job, complete the heist in stealth within 4 minutes with each crew member wearing the Improved Combined Tactical Vest and no Armor Bag deployable equipped. Unlocks the "Classic Stock" for the AK weapon family, "2 Piece Stock" for the AK and CAR weapon families, "Pachy" mask, "Fossil" material and "Prehistoric Predator" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Private Party
all_achievements.description: In the Jewelry store job, don't let the cops enter the jewelry store until the van comes back on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "DMR Kit AMR-16" and the "L5 Magazine" for the CAR weapon family, "Vincent" mask, "Feathers" material and "Dinosaur Scars" pattern.

all_achievements.name: The Collector
all_achievements.description: Kill 100 cops using only weapons from the AK or CAR weapon families. Unlocks the "Keymod Rail", the "Crabs Rail" and the "Modern Barrel" for the AK weapon family.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Villainous
all_achievements.description: Reach the sixth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Abominable
all_achievements.description: Reach the seventh rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Fiendish
all_achievements.description: Reach the eighth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Heinous
all_achievements.description: Reach the ninth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Mean
all_achievements.description: Reach the tenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Dangerous
all_achievements.description: Reach the eleventh rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Fearless
all_achievements.description: Reach the twelfth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Nefarious
all_achievements.description: Reach the thirteenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Disreputable
all_achievements.description: Reach the fourteenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Fearful
all_achievements.description: Reach the fifteenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Opprobrious
all_achievements.description: Reach the sixteenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Shady
all_achievements.description: Reach the seventeenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Savage
all_achievements.description: Reach the eighteenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Abhorrent
all_achievements.description: Reach the nineteenth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Sly
all_achievements.description: Reach the twentieth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Crafty
all_achievements.description: Reach the twenty-first rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Shameless
all_achievements.description: Reach the twenty-second rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Diabolical
all_achievements.description: Reach the twenty-third rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Ferocious
all_achievements.description: Reach the twenty-fourth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Becoming Monstrous
all_achievements.description: Reach the twenty-fifth rank of infamy.

all_achievements.name: Cooking With Style
all_achievements.description: Complete the Rats job with you and your four man crew having Combined Tactical Vests, Vulcan Miniguns, HRL-7 Rocket Launchers and "General OVERKILL" masks equipped on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: I Have No Idea What I'm Doing
all_achievements.description: In the Shadow Raid job, complete the heist in stealth while having the Vulcan Minigun and HRL-7 Rocket Launcher equipped.

all_achievements.name: Oh, That's How You Do It
all_achievements.description: Fire the Vulcan Minigun for 25 seconds without reloading or letting go of the trigger.

all_achievements.name: We Are Rockstars On This Job
all_achievements.description: Complete the Watchdogs job with each crew member using no skills, wielding the AMCAR Rifle and Chimano 88 Pistol on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Reputation Beyond Reproach
all_achievements.description: In the Breaking Ballot heist of the Election Day job, complete the heist with you and your four man crew without letting anyone getting downed, cloaked or cuffed on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: House Keeping
all_achievements.description: In the Big Oil job, complete day 1 in stealth on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: 120 Proof
all_achievements.description: Kill 120 or more enemies in any day in a heist, with you and your four man crew having at least 120% crew accuracy at the end of the heist.

all_achievements.name: Boston Saints
all_achievements.description: Complete the Big Oil job, with at least one other player, all using suits and Akimbo Bernetti 9 Pistols on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Bring Your Cop To Work Day
all_achievements.description: On any day of a heist, have four law enforcers converted at the same time on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Wasteful
all_achievements.description: On day 1 of the Firestarter job, complete heist having burned all weapons on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Speedlock Holmes
all_achievements.description: On day 1 of the Election Day job, tag the right truck and leave within a minute of the start of the heist.

all_achievements.name: Nothing Out of the Ordinary
all_achievements.description: Answer 4 pagers by yourself within 90 seconds from the first to the last pager.

all_achievements.name: Situation Normal
all_achievements.description: In the Hoxton Breakout job, complete day 2 without using a single keycard on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Keep the Party Going
all_achievements.description: In the Nightclub job, zip-tie the DJ and bring him to the escape zone by the escape van.

all_achievements.name: It's Getting Hot in Here
all_achievements.description: In the Firestarter job, complete day 3 with you and your crew staying inside the vault while all of the money burns out on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Cooking By the Book
all_achievements.description: Complete the Cook Off job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Tag, You're It!
all_achievements.description: In the Car Shop job, be the first player in a four-man crew to reach the docks.

all_achievements.name: A Dish Best Served Cold
all_achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Revenge job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Silent But Deadly
all_achievements.description: Complete the Hoxton Revenge job without triggering the alarm.

all_achievements.name: Gone in 240 Seconds
all_achievements.description: In the Car Shop job, complete the heist within 4 minutes. Unlocks "The Tids" mask.

all_achievements.name: I'm An Avenger!
all_achievements.description: Kill the traitor. Unlocks "The Hard Hat" mask.

all_achievements.name: High Octane
all_achievements.description: Complete the Car Shop job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Pink Slip
all_achievements.description: Enter a drivable vehicle.

all_achievements.name: Disco Inferno
all_achievements.description: Have 10 enemies burning simultaneously. Unlocks the "Graug" mask, "Coal" material and "Fireborn" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Stick a Fork in Me, I'm Done
all_achievements.description: Set an enemy on fire and kill him with the "Motherforker" melee weapon. Unlocks "The Gas Mask" mask, "Candlelight" material and "Flammable" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Not Invited
all_achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies within 10 seconds using the Piglet Grenade Launcher without using Incendiary rounds. Unlocks the "Firefighter's Helmet" mask, "Burn" material and "Flamer" pattern.

all_achievements.name: OVERGRILL
all_achievements.description: Set a Bulldozer on fire for at least 10 seconds. Unlocks "The Chef" mask, "Toast" material and "Hot Flames" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Recycling
all_achievements.description: Pick up 100 arrows. Unlocks the "Desert Skull" mask, "Western Sunset" material and "Mystical" pattern.

all_achievements.name: The Nobel Prize
all_achievements.description: Kill 3 enemies at the same time with the Dynamite. Unlocks the "Wild West Classic" mask, "Cactus" material and "Coyote" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Hedgehog
all_achievements.description: Get 10 or more arrows stuck in a Bulldozer at the same time. Unlocks the "Lone Heister" mask, "Scorpion" material and "Totem" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Fastest Gun in the West
all_achievements.description: Kill 6 law enforcers within 6 seconds of killing the first while hipfiring with the Peacemaker .45 Revolver. Unlocks the "Apache Mystic" mask, "Gold Fever" material and "Sacred" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Pedal to the Metal
all_achievements.description: Complete the Meltdown job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Sunday Drive
all_achievements.description: Complete the Meltdown job on the Normal difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: They Don't Pay Us Enough
all_achievements.description: In the Meltdown job, secure all additional loot. Unlocks the "Rad Mutant" mask.

all_achievements.name: There Was a Car?!
all_achievements.description: In the Meltdown job, complete the heist without using the "Longfellow".

all_achievements.name: We Built This City on Electric Progressive House Music
all_achievements.description: Complete The Alesso Heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Sound of Silence
all_achievements.description: Complete The Alesso Heist without your crew killing anyone. Unlocks the "Boom Box" mask, "Enlightenment" material and "Alesso Logo" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Even Steven
all_achievements.description: In The Alesso Heist, get your seven bucks back. Unlocks the "Cantus" mask, "Bionic" material and "Circle Raster" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Fuck It, We're Walking
all_achievements.description: In The Alesso Heist, complete the heist in loud without using the zip-line or bag chutes on the OVERKILL difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Female Concert Goer" mask, "Stained Glass" material and "Soundwave" pattern.

all_achievements.name: M.F. Stev
all_achievements.description: In The Alesso Heist, complete the pyrosequences without failing even once. Unlocks the "Male Concert Goer" mask, "Dim Blue" material and "Smoke" pattern.

all_achievements.name: How the Fuck Can You Grin?
all_achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

all_achievements.name: Blind Eye in the Sky
all_achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job in stealth. Unlocks the "Wheeler Dealer" mask, "Stars" material and "Chips" pattern.

all_achievements.name: City of Sin and Well-Oiled Gears
all_achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job without having the Big Fucking Drill ever break in loud. Unlocks the "Murmillo Galea Helmet" mask, "Casino" material and "Royale" pattern.

all_achievements.name: High Roller
all_achievements.description: Complete the Golden Grin Casino job under 14 minutes. Unlocks "The King" mask, "Plush" material and "Cards" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Hail to the King, Baby
all_achievements.description: In the Golden Grin Casino job, kill "The King" and complete the heist in stealth. Unlocks the "Sports Utility Mask" mask, "Carpet" material and "Dices" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Names Are for Friends, so I Don't Need One
all_achievements.description: Get eleven kills with the Lebensauger .308 Sniper Rifle without reloading it. Unlocks the "Slicer" mask, "Still Waters" material and "Youkai" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Swiss Cheese
all_achievements.description: Kill 100 enemies in a single day of a heist with the Kross Vertex Submachine Gun. Unlocks the "Kage" mask, "Sakura" material and "Oni" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Shuriken Shenanigans

all_achievements.name: Fugu Fighter

all_achievements.name: Their Armor Is Thick and Their Shields Broad
all_achievements.description: Kill 10 shields with a Gage Chivalry Pack melee weapon in a single heist. Unlocks the "Agatha Vanguard Veteran" mask, "Chain Armor" material and "Medieval" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Skewer
all_achievements.description: Kill a Cloaker with the Javelin throwable. Unlocks the "Mason Knight Veteran" mask, "Scale Armor" material and "Mason" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Black Knight
all_achievements.description: Kill a black Bulldozer with the Great Sword melee weapon. Unlocks the "Mason Vanguard Veteran" mask, "Forged" material and "Checkered Out" pattern.

all_achievements.name: Choo Choo

all_achievements.name: 400 Bucks

all_achievements.description: In public matches, down survivors 20 times with The Huntress' Hatchets further than 24 meters.

all_achievements.name: Adept Huntress
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Huntress using only her 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Butcherin'
all_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Cannibal, successfully chainsaw a total of 100 times.

all_achievements.name: Texas BBQ
all_achievements.description: In public matches, hook 25 Survivors in the Basement. Once per Survivor per match.

all_achievements.name: Adept Cannibal
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Cannibal using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Looter
all_achievements.description: In public matches, unlock 100 chests.

all_achievements.name: Escaping the Nightmare
all_achievements.description: In public matches, open the exit gate 35 times as a Survivor.

all_achievements.name: Adept Quentin
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Quentin using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Dream Demon
all_achievements.description: In public matches, pull 200 Survivors into the Dream World.

all_achievements.name: Serial Killer
all_achievements.description: In public matches, Sacrifice the Obsession 30 times.

all_achievements.name: Adept Nightmare
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Nightmare using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Holiday Get-Together
all_achievements.description: In a public match, have at least 3 survivors hooked in the basement at the same time.

all_achievements.name: Milk 'n' Cookies
all_achievements.description: In a public match, take the item from the chest in the basement in at least 30 different trials.

all_achievements.name: Happy Holidays
all_achievements.description: Open at least 100 Winter Gifts (or mystery boxes) on the bloodweb.

all_achievements.name: Near-Death Experience
all_achievements.description: In public matches, get downed only once and escape the match alive, 25 times.

all_achievements.name: Cherish your Life
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in The Game's Bathroom and live to tell the story.

all_achievements.name: Adept Tapp
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Detective Tapp using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: I Want to Play a Game
all_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Pig, put 125 Reverse Bear Traps on Survivors.

all_achievements.name: Game Over
all_achievements.description: In public matches, sacrifice or kill 30 Survivors after the last Generator has been activated.

all_achievements.name: Adept Pig
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Pig using only her 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Campbell's Chapel Legacy
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the chapel and live to tell the tale.

all_achievements.name: Whiffing to Success
all_achievements.description: In public matches, cause the killer to miss an attack before taking a vault, 50 times.

all_achievements.name: Adept Kate
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Kate, using only her 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Party Crasher
all_achievements.description: In public matches, damage a Generator while at least 1 Survivor is Hooked, 100 times.

all_achievements.name: Smoked
all_achievements.description: In public matches, down 100 Survivors while they are intoxicated by The Afterpiece Tonic.

all_achievements.name: Adept Clown
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Clown, using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Ancestor's Rite
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Family Residence and live to tell the tale.

all_achievements.name: Not Today
all_achievements.description: In public matches, unhook yourself 50 times.

all_achievements.name: Adept Adam
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Adam using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Outrage
all_achievements.description: In public matches, during a chase, damage a Survivor who drops a Pallet within a chase, 100 times.

all_achievements.name: Conniption
all_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Spirit, use Yamaoka's Haunting to down 30 Survivors.

all_achievements.name: Adept Spirit
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Spirit using only her 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Dismantle
all_achievements.description: In public matches, break a total of 50 individual Hooks.

all_achievements.name: Unforgettable Getaway
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Chalet and live to tell the tale.

all_achievements.name: Adept Jeff
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Jeff using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Heavy Burden
all_achievements.description: In public matches, hit 25 different individual Survivors while carrying another Survivor.

all_achievements.name: Deranged Pursuit
all_achievements.description: In public matches, as the Legion, down 25 different Survivors that have Deep Wound applied.

all_achievements.name: Adept Legion
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Legion using only their 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Wounded Healer
all_achievements.description: In public matches, heal other Survivors for a total of 50 health states while you are also injured.

all_achievements.name: Shrine Apparatus
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Temple basement and live to tell the tale.

all_achievements.name: Adept Jane
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Jane using only her 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Devoted Gatekeeping
all_achievements.description: In public matches, sacrifice all survivors before the last generator is repaired, 15 times.

all_achievements.name: Terminal Illness
all_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Plague, down 50 Survivors affected by the maximum infection.

all_achievements.name: Adept Plague
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Plague using only their 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Cutting Out
all_achievements.description: In public matches, while The Killer is carrying you, wiggle out of The Killer's grasp 10 times.

all_achievements.name: Outrun Evil
all_achievements.description: In a public match, crawl your way out through the hatch.

all_achievements.name: Adept Ash
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Ash using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Silent Approach
all_achievements.description: In public matches, interrupt and grab 25 Survivors while they are repairing generators.

all_achievements.name: Totally Vulnerable
all_achievements.description: In public matches, with Ghostface, down 50 Marked Survivors.

all_achievements.name: Adept Ghost Face
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Ghost Face using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Denied!
all_achievements.description: In public matches, close the hatch 30 times.

all_achievements.name: Savage Takedown
all_achievements.description: In public matches with The Demogorgon use Shred to down 30 Survivors.

all_achievements.name: Adept Demogorgon
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Demogorgon using only its 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: So Alone
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in Underground Complex's isolation room and escape.

all_achievements.name: Adept Steve
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Steve using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Adept Nancy
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Nancy using only her 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Broken Bodies
all_achievements.description: In public matches, hook a Survivor while 3 other Survivors are injured, 10 times.

all_achievements.name: Bloodbath
all_achievements.description: In public matches with The Oni, down 75 Survivors during Blood Fury.

all_achievements.name: Adept Oni
all_achievements.description: In a public match, achieve a merciless victory with The Oni using only his 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Grim Pilgrimage
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the upper level of the Shrine and escape.

all_achievements.name: Bodyguard
all_achievements.description: In public matches, take a protection hit while the Killer is carrying a Survivor, 30 times.

all_achievements.name: Adept Yui
all_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with Yui Kimura using only her 3 unique perks.

all_achievements.name: Bound and Downed
all_achievements.description: Down speared Survivors 30 times with The Deathslinger in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Quick Draw
all_achievements.description: Interrupt a Survivor cleansing a Totem 10 times in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Deathslinger
all_achievements.description: Achieve a merciless victory with The Deathslinger using only his 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Old West Oasis
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Saloon and escape.

all_achievements.name: Selfless Survival
all_achievements.description: Heal a Survivor from the dying state to the injured state 30 times in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Zarina
all_achievements.description: Escape with Zarina Kassir using only her 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Cleansed in Agony
all_achievements.description: Ensnare 30 Survivors in Cages of Atonement with The Executioner in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Death of Ignorance
all_achievements.description: Down a Survivor suffering from the Oblivious status effect 15 times in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Executioner
all_achievements.description: Achieve a merciless victory with The Executioner using only his 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Classy Act
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in Midwich School's music room or chem lab and escape.

all_achievements.name: Healthy Obsession
all_achievements.description: Heal other Survivors marked as the Obsession for a total of 10 health states in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Cheryl
all_achievements.description: Escape with Cheryl Mason using only her 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Speed Kills
all_achievements.description: Hit 30 survivors with a Lethal Rush in public matches.

all_achievements.name: I See You
all_achievements.description: Down 30 Survivors suffering from the Exposed status effect in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Blight
all_achievements.description: Achieve a merciless victory with The Blight using only his 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Every Last Drop
all_achievements.description: Deplete 30 items in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Resurgence
all_achievements.description: Heal other Survivors for 10 health states while at least 3 Survivors are injured, dying or hooked.

all_achievements.name: Adept Felix
all_achievements.description: Escape with Felix Richter using only his 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Tag Team
all_achievements.description: With The Twins, down 10 Survivors while Victor is clinging to them in a public match.

all_achievements.name: End of Days
all_achievements.description: Hook 15 Survivors during the End Game Collapse in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Twins
all_achievements.description: Achieve a merciless victory with The Twins using only their 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Rescue Mission
all_achievements.description: Stun the Killer with a pallet while they are carrying a Survivor 5 times.

all_achievements.name: Power Moves
all_achievements.description: Equip 0 perks, repair generators for a total of 1 full repair and escape 8 times in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Élodie
all_achievements.description: Escape with Élodie using only her 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: One Thousand Cuts
all_achievements.description: Deal maximum Laceration on Survivors 50 times in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Multi-tasker
all_achievements.description: Down 30 Survivors while carrying another Survivor in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Trickster
all_achievements.description: Achieve a merciless victory with The Trickster using only his 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Insult and Injury
all_achievements.description: Escape a chase 50 times after stunning the Killer with a pallet in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Close Shave
all_achievements.description: Dodge basic attacks or projectiles 100 times in public matches.

all_achievements.name: Adept Yun-Jin
all_achievements.description: Escape with Yun-Jin using only her 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Biological Weaponry
all_achievements.description: Down Contaminated Survivors with The Nemesis 65 times in public matches using Tentacle Strike.

all_achievements.name: Preemptive Strike
all_achievements.description: Hook a Survivor in a public match before any generators have been fully repaired.

all_achievements.name: Adept Nemesis
all_achievements.description: Achieve a merciless victory with The Nemesis using only his 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Raccoon City Recruit
all_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator on the 1st floor of the RPD station’s main hall and escape.

all_achievements.name: Adept Leon
all_achievements.description: Escape with Leon using only his 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.name: Adept Jill
all_achievements.description: Escape with Jill using only her 3 unique perks in a public match.

all_achievements.description: Find a mysterious creature hidden in the temple.

all_achievements.name: Trials
all_achievements.description: Sneak through the underground passage without tearing your scarf.

all_achievements.name: History
all_achievements.description: Uncover all 10 ancient glyphs.

all_achievements.name: Crossing
all_achievements.description: Reach the summit with a companion and return to the beginning.

all_achievements.name: Rebirth
all_achievements.description: Finish the game and return to the beginning.

all_achievements.name: Companion
all_achievements.description: Finish the game with the same partner for the majority of the journey and return to the beginning.

all_achievements.name: Reflection
all_achievements.description: Sit and meditate with another player for more than 20 seconds.

all_achievements.name: Wonder
all_achievements.description: Meet 10 or more unique travelers.

all_achievements.name: Return
all_achievements.description: Start the journey again after a week long break.

all_achievements.name: Transcendence
all_achievements.description: Collect all unique glowing symbols across one or more journeys.
